actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a credit against income tax for amounts paid for educational expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a limited income tax credit for educational expenses incurred for the higher education of themselves, their spouses and their dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a credit against income tax for amounts paid for educational expenses.
